description.narrative: Expected development impact includes: (i) development of much-needed accommodation infrastructure to improve the liveability of Port Moresby; (ii) employment creation, including both during the construction and operational phase; and (iii) purchases from domestic suppliers and tax generation.

title.narrative: Summary of Investment Information - Anticipated Impact Measurement & Monitoring (AIMM) Assessment and Main Environmental & Social Risks and Impacts of the Project
